# Stata requirements for HAFiscal
# Version requirements and packages

# Required Stata version
# MP/18.0 or compatible (as mentioned in README)

# Required packages/commands (if any)
# These would be installed via Stata's package manager
# Currently no specific packages identified beyond base Stata

# Data files required:
# - rscfp2004.dta (Survey of Consumer Finances 2004)
# - ccbal_answer.dta (Credit card balance data)
# 
# These are included in the repository in Code/Empirical/
